metadata.title: CVE-2018-20364 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
LibRaw::copy_bayer in libraw_cxx.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1 has a NULL pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.2-2
libraw20 - 0.19.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.

kodi package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
rawtherapee package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
